column3: Uncategorized;*A series of photos of the competent authorities at work examining a death.------Bavet: On Tuesday
column7: the cops received information about a dead man from the San Feng factory in the Manhattan Special Economic Zone
column11: Svay Rieng province.------The cops came to the scene to look at the body of Sap Paly
